text.body:
<div type="collation" xml:id="C25">
<seg sID="C25_app1-fMS"/> <anchor type="collate" xml:id="C25"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0090__main__d4e16243"/> <metamark function="paragraph">[</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0090__main__d4e16243"/> <seg eID="C25_app1-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C25_app2-fMS"/> At Cologne we descended <lb n="c57-0090__main__18"/>to the plains of Holland <seg eID="C25_app2-fMS"/> & we resolved to <lb n="c57-0090__main__19"/>post the remainder of our <seg sID="C25_app4-fMS"/> way <seg eID="C25_app4-fMS"/> for <lb n="c57-0090__main__20"/>the wind was <seg sID="C25_app6-fMS"/> contrary <seg eID="C25_app6-fMS"/> & the stream of <lb n="c57-0090__main__21"/>the river was too gentle to aid us. <seg sID="C25_app8-fMS"/> We now <lb n="c57-0090__main__22"/>arrived at very different country. The <lb n="c57-0090__main__23"/>soil was sandy and the wheels sunk deep <lb n="c57-0090__main__24"/>in it. The towns of th <mod sID="c57-0090__main__d4e16264"/> <mdel>e</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0090__main__d4e16268"/>is <sga-add eID="c57-0090__main__d4e16268"/> <mod eID="c57-0090__main__d4e16264"/> country are the <lb n="c57-0090__main__25"/>most pleasing part of the scene. The <lb n="c57-0090__main__26"/>Dutch are extremely neat but there is <lb n="c57-0090__main__27"/>an awkwardness in their contrivances <lb n="c57-0090__main__28"/>that often surprised us. In one place, <lb n="c57-0090__main__29"/>I remember, a wind mill was <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0090__main__d4e16283">placed</del> <lb n="c57-0090__main__30"/>situated in such a manner that the <lb n="c57-0090__main__31"/>postillion was obliged to guide the <w ana="start"/>car<lb n="c57-0090__main__32"/>riage<w ana="end"/> close to the opposite side of the <lb n="c57-0090__main__33"/>road to escape from the sweep of its <lb n="c57-0090__main__34"/>sails. The way often led between two <w ana="start"/>ca<lb n="c57-0090__main__35"/>nals<w ana="end"/> where the road was only broard<zone eID="c57-0090__main"/> <surface eID="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0090"/> <surface lrx="5138" lry="7032" partOf="#ox-frankenstein_volume_ii" ulx="0" uly="0" folio="46r" shelfmark="MS. Abinger c. 57" base="ox-ms_abinger_c57/ox-ms_abinger_c57-0091.xml" id="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0091" sID="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0091"/> <graphic url="http://shelleygodwinarchive.org/images/ox/ms_abinger_c57/ms_abinger_c57-0091.jp2"/> <zone type="main" sID="c57-0091__main"/> <lb n="c57-0091__main__1"/>enough to allow one carriage to pass <lb n="c57-0091__main__2"/>and when we met another vehicle <lb n="c57-0091__main__3"/>which was frequently the case we were <lb n="c57-0091__main__4"/>rolled back sometimes for nearly a <lb n="c57-0091__main__5"/>mile untill we found one of the <lb n="c57-0091__main__6"/>drawbridges which led to the fields, down <lb n="c57-0091__main__7"/>on which one carriage remained <lb n="c57-0091__main__8"/>while the other <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0091__main__d4e16334">carriage</del> passed <lb n="c57-0091__main__9"/>on. They soak their flax also in the <lb n="c57-0091__main__10"/>mud of their canals and place it <lb n="c57-0091__main__11"/>against the trees along the road side <lb n="c57-0091__main__12"/>to dry. When the sun is hot the <lb n="c57-0091__main__13"/>scent <mod sID="c57-0091__main__d4e16348"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0091__main__d4e16350">that</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0091__main__d4e16353"/>which <sga-add eID="c57-0091__main__d4e16353"/> <mod eID="c57-0091__main__d4e16348"/> this exhales is not very <lb n="c57-0091__main__14"/>easily endured. Yet the roads are <lb n="c57-0091__main__15"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0091__main__d4e16362">good</del> excellent & the verdure beautiful<milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg eID="C25_app8-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0091__main__16"/>From <seg sID="C25_app10-fMS"/> Rotterdam <seg eID="C25_app10-fMS"/> we <seg sID="C25_app12-fMS"/> went <seg eID="C25_app12-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0091__main__17"/>by sea to England. It was on a clear <seg sID="C25_app14-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0091__main__18"/>morning <seg eID="C25_app14-fMS"/> in the latter <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0091__main__d4e16373"/>days <sga-add eID="c57-0091__main__d4e16373"/>of <seg sID="C25_app17-fMS"/> September <seg eID="C25_app17-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0091__main__19"/>that I first saw the white cliffs of <lb n="c57-0091__main__20"/>Britain. The banks <seg sID="C25_app19-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0091__main__d4e16381"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0091__main__d4e16383"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0091__main__d4e16383"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0091__main__d4e16389"/>of the <seg eID="C25_app19-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0091__main__d4e16389"/><mod eID="c57-0091__main__d4e16381"/>Thames presented <lb n="c57-0091__main__21"/>a new scene; they were <seg sID="C25_app21-fMS"/> flat <seg eID="C25_app21-fMS"/> but <seg sID="C25_app23-fMS"/> fertile <lb n="c57-0091__main__22"/> & almost every town was marked by <lb n="c57-0091__main__23"/>some story. <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0091__main__d4e16400">Th</del> <seg eID="C25_app23-fMS"/> We saw Tilbury <seg sID="C25_app25-fMS"/> Fort &<lb n="c57-0091__main__24"/>remembered <seg eID="C25_app25-fMS"/> the Spanish Armada; <lb n="c57-0091__main__25"/>Gravesend, Woolwich, <seg sID="C25_app27-fMS"/> Greenwich <seg eID="C25_app27-fMS"/> places <lb n="c57-0091__main__26"/>which I had heard of even in my <lb n="c57-0091__main__27"/>country. At length we saw the <w ana="start"/>nume<lb n="c57-0091__main__28"/>rous<w ana="end"/> steeples of <seg sID="C25_app31-fMS"/> London; <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0091__main__d4e16418">&</del> St Pauls <lb n="c57-0091__main__29"/>towerering <seg eID="C25_app31-fMS"/> above <seg sID="C25_app33-fMS"/> all <seg eID="C25_app33-fMS"/> & the Tower famed <lb n="c57-0091__main__30"/>in English History. <lb n="c57-0092__main__1"/> <seg sID="C25_app37-fMS"/> <milestone spanTo="#c57-0092.02" unit="tei:head"/>Chap <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16439">11</del> 2. <anchor xml:id="c57-0092.02"/> <seg eID="C25_app37-fMS"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg sID="C25_app39-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0092__main__2"/>London <seg eID="C25_app39-fMS"/> was <seg sID="C25_app41-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16449">the</del> our present point <lb n="c57-0092__main__3"/>of rest; we determined to remain several <lb n="c57-0092__main__4"/>months in this wonderful & celebrated city. <seg eID="C25_app41-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C25_app42-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0092__main__5"/>Cl <mod sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16458"/> <mdel>ai</mdel> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16462"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16462"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16468"/>e <sga-add eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16468"/><mod eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16458"/> rval <mod sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16473"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16475">wished</del> <seg eID="C25_app42-fMS"/> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16478"/>desired <seg sID="C25_app44-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16478"/><mod eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16473"/> for the intercourse of <lb n="c57-0092__main__6"/>the men of genius & talent who <w ana="start"/>flou<lb n="c57-0092__main__7"/>rished<w ana="end"/> at <seg eID="C25_app44-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C25_app45-fMS"/> that <seg eID="C25_app45-fMS"/> time; but this <seg sID="C25_app47-fMS"/> was, <seg eID="C25_app47-fMS"/> with <seg sID="C25_app49-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0092__main__8"/>me, <seg eID="C25_app49-fMS"/> a secondary <seg sID="C25_app51-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16493"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16495">consideration</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16498"/>object <sga-add eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16498"/><mod eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16493"/> ; <seg eID="C25_app51-fMS"/> I was <w ana="start"/>princi<lb n="c57-0092__main__9"/>pally<w ana="end"/> occupied with the means of obtaining <lb n="c57-0092__main__10"/>the information necessary for the <w ana="start"/>comple<lb n="c57-0092__main__11"/>tion<w ana="end"/> of my <seg sID="C25_app53-fMS"/> promise <seg eID="C25_app53-fMS"/> and quickly availed <lb n="c57-0092__main__12"/>myself of the letters of introduction that <lb n="c57-0092__main__13"/>I had brought with <seg sID="C25_app55-fMS"/> me <seg eID="C25_app55-fMS"/> addressed to <lb n="c57-0092__main__14"/>the <seg sID="C25_app57-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16523"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16525">various</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16528"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16528"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16534"/>most <seg eID="C25_app57-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C25_app58-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16534"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16537">men of sci</del> <mod eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16523"/> distinguished <lb n="c57-0092__main__15"/>natural philosophers. <seg eID="C25_app58-fMS"/> If this journey had <lb n="c57-0092__main__16"/>taken place during my days of study <seg sID="C25_app61-fMS"/> &<lb n="c57-0092__main__17"/>happiness <seg eID="C25_app61-fMS"/> it would have afforded me <lb n="c57-0092__main__18"/>inexpressible <seg sID="C25_app63-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16550">delight</del> pleasure. But a <lb n="c57-0092__main__19"/>blight had come over my <seg eID="C25_app63-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C25_app64-fMS"/> existence <seg eID="C25_app64-fMS"/> & I only <lb n="c57-0092__main__20"/>visited these people for the sake of the <lb n="c57-0092__main__21"/>information they might give <seg sID="C25_app66-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16560">d</del> me on <lb n="c57-0092__main__22"/>the subject in which <seg eID="C25_app66-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C25_app67-fMS"/> I <seg eID="C25_app67-fMS"/> was so <seg sID="C25_app69-fMS"/> deeply <lb n="c57-0092__main__23"/>interrested. <seg eID="C25_app69-fMS"/> Company was <seg sID="C25_app71-fMS"/> ir <mod sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16567"/> <mdel/> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16574"/>k <sga-add eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16574"/><mod eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16567"/> some <seg eID="C25_app71-fMS"/> to me; <lb n="c57-0092__main__24"/>when <seg sID="C25_app73-fMS"/> alone <seg eID="C25_app73-fMS"/> I could fill my mind with the <lb n="c57-0092__main__25"/>sights of heaven & earth; the voice of <seg sID="C25_app75-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0092__main__d4e16583">He</del> <lb n="c57-0092__main__26"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0092.01"/><lb n="c57-0092__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c57-0092__left_margin__d4e16597"/>Henry <sga-add eID="c57-0092__left_margin__d4e16597"/>soothed <seg eID="C25_app75-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C25_app76-fMS"/> me <seg eID="C25_app76-fMS"/> & I could cheat myself into <seg sID="C25_app80-fMS"/> a<lb n="c57-0092__main__27"/>transitory <seg eID="C25_app80-fMS"/> peace. But <seg sID="C25_app82-fMS"/> busy, uninterresting,<lb n="c57-0092__main__28"/>joyous <seg eID="C25_app82-fMS"/> faces brought back despair to <seg sID="C25_app84-fMS"/> my<lb n="c57-0092__main__29"/>heart. <seg eID="C25_app84-fMS"/> I saw an insurmountable <seg sID="C25_app86-fMS"/> barrie<lb n="c57-0092__main__30"/>placed <seg eID="C25_app86-fMS"/> between me & my <seg sID="C25_app88-fMS"/> fellow men; <seg eID="C25_app88-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C25_app89-fMS"/> thi<lb n="c57-0092__main__31"/>barrier <seg eID="C25_app89-fMS"/> was sealed with the blood <seg sID="C25_app91-fMS"/> of<lb n="c57-0092__main__32"/>William <seg eID="C25_app91-fMS"/> and <seg sID="C25_app93-fMS"/> Justine, <seg eID="C25_app93-fMS"/> and to reflect <seg sID="C25_app95-fMS"/> on<lb n="c57-0092__main__33"/>those <seg eID="C25_app95-fMS"/> events filled my soul with <seg sID="C25_app99-fMS"/> anguish<lb n="c57-0092__main__34"/>But in Cl <mod sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16634"/> <mdel>ai</mdel> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0092__main__d4e16638"/>e <sga-add eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16638"/><mod eID="c57-0092__main__d4e16634"/> rval <seg eID="C25_app99-fMS"/> I saw the image of my <lb n="c57-0092__main__35"/>former self; he was <seg sID="C25_app101-fMS"/> inquisitive <seg eID="C25_app101-fMS"/> & anxious <lb n="c57-0093__main__1"/>to gain experience & <seg sID="C25_app103-fMS"/> instruction; <seg eID="C25_app103-fMS"/> The <lb n="c57-0093__main__2"/>difference of manners <seg sID="C25_app105-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0093__main__d4e16657"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16659">that</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0093__main__d4e16662"/>which <seg eID="C25_app105-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0093__main__d4e16662"/><mod eID="c57-0093__main__d4e16657"/>he observed <lb n="c57-0093__main__3"/>was to him <seg sID="C25_app107-fMS"/> <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16668">&</del> an inexhaustible source of <seg eID="C25_app107-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C25_app108-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0093__main__4"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0093.01"/><lb n="c57-0093__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c57-0093__left_margin__d4e16680"/> observation & <sga-add eID="c57-0093__left_margin__d4e16680"/> <seg eID="C25_app108-fMS"/> <zone eID="c57-0093__left_margin"/> amusement. <seg sID="C25_app110-fMS"/> He was for ever <seg eID="C25_app110-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C25_app111-fMS"/> busy <seg eID="C25_app111-fMS"/> & the <lb n="c57-0093__main__5"/>only check to his enjoyments was my <seg sID="C25_app113-fMS"/> <w ana="start"/>sor<lb n="c57-0093__main__6"/>rowful<w ana="end"/>& <seg eID="C25_app113-fMS"/> dejected <seg sID="C25_app115-fMS"/> m <mod sID="c57-0093__main__d4e16692"/> <mdel>ei</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0093__main__d4e16696"/>ie <sga-add eID="c57-0093__main__d4e16696"/><mod eID="c57-0093__main__d4e16692"/> n. <seg eID="C25_app115-fMS"/> I tried to conceal <lb n="c57-0093__main__7"/>this as much as <seg sID="C25_app117-fMS"/> possible <seg eID="C25_app117-fMS"/> that I might not <lb n="c57-0093__main__8"/>debar him from the pleasures natural <lb n="c57-0093__main__9"/>to <seg sID="C25_app119-fMS"/> one <seg eID="C25_app119-fMS"/> who was entering on a new scene <lb n="c57-0093__main__10"/>of life, undisturbed by any care or <seg sID="C25_app121-fMS"/> <del rend="smear" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16709"> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0093__main__d4e16711"/>the <sga-add eID="c57-0093__main__d4e16711"/> </del> <w ana="start"/>bitter<lb n="c57-0093__main__11"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0093.02"/><lb n="c57-0093__left_margin__1"/> <seg eID="C25_app121-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C25_app122-fMS"/> <del rend="smear" xml:id="c57-0093__left_margin__d4e16725"> <sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c57-0093__left_margin__d4e16727"/>ness<w ana="end"/> of <sga-add eID="c57-0093__left_margin__d4e16727"/> </del> recollection. I often refused to accompany <seg eID="C25_app122-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C25_app123-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0093__main__12"/>him alledging <seg eID="C25_app123-fMS"/> another <seg sID="C25_app125-fMS"/> engagement <seg eID="C25_app125-fMS"/> that <lb n="c57-0093__main__13"/>I might remain <seg sID="C25_app127-fMS"/> a alone; <seg eID="C25_app127-fMS"/> I now also <lb n="c57-0093__main__14"/>began to collect the materials necessary <lb n="c57-0093__main__15"/>for my <seg sID="C25_app129-fMS"/> <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16743">work</del> new <seg eID="C25_app129-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C25_app130-fMS"/> creation <seg eID="C25_app130-fMS"/> & this was <seg sID="C25_app132-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16746">a</del> to <lb n="c57-0093__main__16"/>me like the torture of single drops of <lb n="c57-0093__main__17"/>water continually falling on the <seg eID="C25_app132-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C25_app133-fMS"/> head; <seg eID="C25_app133-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0093__main__18"/>Every thought that was devoted to it <lb n="c57-0093__main__19"/>was <seg sID="C25_app135-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16758">th</del> an extreme anguish, and every <lb n="c57-0093__main__20"/>word that I spoke in allusion to it caused <lb n="c57-0093__main__21"/>my lips to <seg eID="C25_app135-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C25_app136-fMS"/> quiver <seg eID="C25_app136-fMS"/> & my heart to <seg sID="C25_app138-fMS"/> palpitate <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0093__main__d4e16766"/>. <sga-add eID="c57-0093__main__d4e16766"/><lb n="c57-0093__main__22"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16771">in a most painful degre</del> <del rend="unmarked" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16774">e.</del> <seg eID="C25_app138-fMS"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0093__main__23"/>After passing some months in <seg sID="C25_app140-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0093__main__24"/>London <seg eID="C25_app140-fMS"/> we received a letter from a <lb n="c57-0093__main__25"/>person in <seg sID="C25_app142-fMS"/> Scotland <seg eID="C25_app142-fMS"/> who had formerly <lb n="c57-0093__main__26"/>been <seg sID="C25_app144-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0093__main__d4e16788">an</del> our <seg eID="C25_app144-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C25_app145-fMS"/> visitor <seg eID="C25_app145-fMS"/> at Geneva.
